statements: SELECT id, temperature, humidity, soil_moisture FROM sensor_data;
SELECT temperature, humidity, soil_moisture, id FROM sensor_data;
SELECT id, humidity, soil_moisture, temperature FROM sensor_data;
SELECT humidity, id, soil_moisture, temperature FROM sensor_data;
SELECT soil_moisture, temperature, id, humidity FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT id, soil_moisture FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, soil_moisture FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND soil_moisture < 40;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50 AND temperature < 25 ORDER BY soil_moisture DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING max_reading > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature FROM sensors WHERE humidity > 70 ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT s.location, sd.timestamp, sd.reading_value FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id WHERE sd.reading_value > 50 ORDER BY sd.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature, humidity, soil_moisture FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id, location LIMIT 5;

SELECT s.sensor_id, s.location, s.humidity, sd.timestamp, sd.reading_value FROM sensors s LEFT JOIN sensor_data sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id WHERE s.temperature < 25 ORDER BY sd.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM temperature ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, value FROM humidity WHERE value > 50
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_temperature FROM temperature
SELECT MIN(date) AS earliest_date FROM humidity
SELECT * FROM temperature WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT id, value FROM humidity WHERE value <= 50 AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT date, value FROM soil_moisture WHERE value > 30 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, date, value FROM temperature JOIN humidity ON temperature.id = humidity.id WHERE temperature.value > 25 AND humidity.value < 60
SELECT * FROM temperature JOIN soil_moisture ON temperature.id = soil_moisture.id WHERE temperature.date = soil_moisture.date AND temperature.value >= 20 AND soil_moisture.value < 40
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT temperature, time_stamp FROM temperature_data ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM temperature_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2021-07-01' AND '2021-07-31';
SELECT sensor_name, moisture_level FROM sensors JOIN soil_moisture_data ON sensors.sensor_id = soil_moisture_data.sensor_id WHERE moisture_level < 50;
SELECT temperature, humidity, moisture_level FROM temperature_data, humidity_data, soil_moisture_data
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM temperature_data, humidity_data GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT sensor_name, moisture_level FROM sensors JOIN soil_moisture_data ON sensors.sensor_id = soil_moisture_data.sensor_id WHERE moisture_level < 0.5
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM humidity_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT * FROM temperature_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM humidity_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT device_name FROM sensor_devices WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location FROM sensor_locations WHERE location LIKE '%garden%';
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM humidity_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, device_name, location FROM sensor_devices d JOIN sensor_locations l ON d.sensor_id = l.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_temp > 25;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM sensor_devices;
